data.message: Facebook needs a "Quote" function so that a post can be addressed without having to copy the entire post. Each post in a topic should be numbered 1,2,3,4,5,6, etc. so that when the Quote is made addressing a comment the Quote response would be - Blue Dwight Huth Box #6 where the answer or comment is directed towards the sixth comment of the topic.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Dwight! We're constantly working to make our products better. We'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
